description.value:
Any armor or weapon this glass prism is affixed to glows softly with shifting colored lights. The spell DC of any spell cast by activating this item is 35.

  • Armor(light) After you cast an abjuration spell by activating the prism, you glow with dim light in a multitude of shimmering hues, shedding light like a torch and making you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] until the end of your next turn.
  • Weapon After you cast an abjuration spell by activating the prism, your Strikes with the weapon gain the brilliant property rune until the end of your next turn.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Light].

Frequency once per day
